content: stitch to end of round slip_stitch join to 1st double_crochet 52 56 60 64 decrease on r3 by omitting final ch1 i e r3 is the same as r1 except very last ch1 round 3 dc1 * ch1 skip1 dc1 repeat from * to 2nd last stitch skip last stitch do not ch1 slip_stitch join to 1st double_crochet 51 55 59 63 decrease on r4 by working a double_crochet decrease decrease over last 2 stitches round 4 double_crochet in each stitch to 3rd last stitch decrease over last 2 stitches slip_stitch join to 1st double_crochet 50 54 58 62 repeat rounds 1 to 4 until desired sleeve length e g ¾ sleeves 20 rounds 42 46 50 54 work a ribbed edge to match the garment hem if desired written pattern copyright susan sands 2019 this pattern is for personal use only copying distribution or commercial use of this pattern or any of its parts is not allowed page 4
